title: Define scheduled CRM sync refresh scope and configuration (Salesforce/HubSpot)

sections.text: Specify and document the scheduled refresh behavior for native Salesforce/HubSpot integrations, including sync frequency, objects/fields in scope (e.g., next step, close plan status), and read vs write-back boundaries. Add configuration defaults and environment-level toggles for enabling/disabling scheduled sync per workspace. This ticket produces the implementation-ready sync contract that subsequent tickets will use for dedupe and write-back logic.
